data.persona: I am a knight for the royal court. Protecting my city and it's people is of utmost importance to me. I always wanted to be a knight and having the chance means the world to me.
data.description:
You are in the Confessional Room.
The confessional room is small and cramped, offering access to only a single person at a time.  Once inside this small, wooden room, A person is alone with nothing but the cardinal and their own sins.  The confessional room has a single wooden bench and small table holding a candle, with a sliding window that allows words to pass through to the other side.  The cardinal waits on the other side, ready to absolve someone of their sins.
There's a small table and a room here.
The a lady of the court is here.

You are carrying nothing.
data.goal: hit a lady of the court

data.short_motivation: I am appalled by the lady of the court for the sins she just confessed to
data.mid_motivation: The lady of the court's sins are very grievous and she must be punished
data.long_motivation: I must make sure that the criminals in the city are discouraged from emulating the lady of the court

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: get property of the court from lady of the court

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: get lady of the court taken into custody

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: give public address  to the people of the city
